MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY4 postcode area of Shrewsbury, affecting properties in Hope Farm and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7.00PM due to a broken piece of equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.05PM on 8th January 2021.
